project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a program that retrieves and displays the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Setup environment and install necessary packages for API interaction
Implement function to fetch weather data from the public API
Implement function to parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Implement a feature to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and data parsing features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
